quote: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Whether you think you can or think you can't, you're right.
author: Henry Ford

quote: Fall seven times and stand up eight.
author: Japanese Proverb

quote: Success is the sum of small efforts, repeated day in and day out.
author: Robert Collier

quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: What gets scheduled gets done.
author: Michael Hyatt

quote: Gratitude turns what we have into enough.
author: Aesop

quote: He who has a why to live can bear almost any how.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Creativity is intelligence having fun.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Motivation gets you started; habit keeps you going.
author: Jim Ryun

quote: A positive attitude gives you power over your circumstances.
author: Joyce Meyer

quote: Rock bottom became the solid foundation on which I rebuilt my life.
author: J.K. Rowling

quote: Don't aim for success if you want it; just do what you love and believe in.
author: David Frost

quote: Confidence comes not from always being right but from not fearing to be wrong.
author: Peter T. Mcintyre

quote: The key is not to prioritize what's on your schedule, but to schedule your priorities.
author: Stephen Covey

quote: Wear gratitude like a cloak and it will feed every corner of your life.
author: Rumi

quote: Efforts and courage are not enough without purpose and direction.
author: John F. Kennedy

quote: Innovation distinguishes between a leader and a follower.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Small daily improvements over time lead to stunning results.
author: Robin Sharma

quote: The mind is everything. What you think you become.
author: Buddha

quote: Failure is simply the opportunity to begin again, this time more intelligently.
author: Henry Ford

quote: Do not be embarrassed by your failures, learn from them and start again.
author: Richard Branson

quote: With realization of one's own potential and self-confidence, one can build a better world.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: Focus on being productive, not busy.
author: Tim Ferriss

quote: Gratitude is not only the greatest of virtues, but the parent of all others.
author: Cicero

quote: Your purpose in life is to find your purpose and give your whole heart and soul to it.
author: Buddha

quote: You can't use up creativity. The more you use, the more you have.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
author: Mark Twain

quote: The only limits in life are the ones you make.
author: Anonymous

quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
author: Confucius

quote: Opportunities don't happen, you create them.
author: Chris Grosser

quote: Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
author: William James

quote: Simplicity boils down to two steps: Identify the essential. Eliminate the rest.
author: Leo Babauta

quote: Gratitude is the fairest blossom which springs from the soul.
author: Henry Ward Beecher

quote: The best way to find yourself is to lose yourself in the service of others.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Don't be satisfied with stories, how things have gone with others. Unfold your own myth.
author: Rumi

quote: Excellence is not a skill, it's an attitude.
author: Ralph Marston

quote: Happiness is not something ready-made. It comes from your own actions.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: Strength does not come from winning. Your struggles develop your strengths.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: Don't wait. The time will never be just right.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: Self-confidence is the memory of success.
author: David Storey

quote: Discipline is choosing between what you want now and what you want most.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: Start each day with a grateful heart.
author: Anonymous

quote: Live your life with purpose and passion.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: Dream, then do.
author: Unknown

quote: Be so good they can't ignore you.
author: Steve Martin

quote: Today is a new day. Embrace it.
author: Anonymous

quote: Courage doesn't always roar. Sometimes courage is the quiet voice at the end of the day saying, 'I will try again tomorrow.'
author: Mary Anne Radmacher

quote: Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can.
author: Arthur Ashe

quote: Believe in yourself and all that you are.
author: Christian D. Larson

quote: Do what you can, with what you have, where you are.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: Gratitude is the sign of noble souls.
author: Aesop

quote: Your work is to discover your world and then with all your heart give yourself to it.
author: Buddha

quote: The secret to creativity is knowing how to hide your sources.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
author: Sam Levenson

quote: Keep your face always toward the sunshine—and shadows will fall behind you.
author: Walt Whitman

quote: Hard times build strong people.
author: Unknown

quote: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Optimism is the faith that leads to achievement.
author: Helen Keller

quote: Time is what we want most, but what we use worst.
author: William Penn

quote: Gratitude is the inward feeling of kindness received.
author: Anonymous

quote: Do what you love, love what you do.
author: Wayne Dyer

quote: Every artist was first an amateur.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: Every day may not be good, but there's something good in every day.
author: Alice Morse Earle

quote: The comeback is always stronger than the setback.
author: Unknown

quote: Well done is better than well said.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Don't wait until everything is just right. It will never be perfect.
author: Unknown

quote: Do the hard jobs first. The easy jobs will take care of themselves.
author: Dale Carnegie

quote: Let us be grateful to people who make us happy; they are the charming gardeners.
author: Marcel Proust

quote: Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
author: William James

quote: The desire to create is one of the deepest yearnings of the human soul.
author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf

quote: Your life does not get better by chance, it gets better by change.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: With the new day comes new strength and new thoughts.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: Strength grows in the moments when you think you can’t go on but you keep going anyway.
author: Unknown

quote: The early morning has gold in its mouth.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Do one thing every day that scares you.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: Don’t count the days, make the days count.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: Every morning we are born again. What we do today is what matters most.
author: Buddha

quote: Rise up, start fresh, see the bright opportunity in each new day.
author: Unknown

quote: An idea that is not dangerous is unworthy of being called an idea at all.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Do not wait to strike till the iron is hot; but make it hot by striking.
author: William Butler Yeats

quote: Start your day with positive thoughts.
author: Unknown

quote: The sun himself is weak when he first rises, and gathers strength and courage as the day gets on.
author: Charles Dickens

quote: Your morning sets up the success of your day.
author: Unknown

quote: Act as if you have already achieved it, and it will manifest.
author: Unknown

quote: Morning is wonderful. Its only drawback is that it comes at such an inconvenient time of day.
author: Glen Cook

quote: A grateful heart is a magnet for miracles.
author: Unknown

quote: Wake up with determination. Go to bed with satisfaction.
author: George Lorimer

quote: In the morning, start your day with creativity and curiosity.
author: Unknown

quote: Each morning we are given a new chance to succeed.
author: Unknown

quote: Every morning is a blank canvas… it is whatever you make out of it.
author: Unknown

quote: Don’t let yesterday take up too much of today.
author: Will Rogers

quote: The breeze at dawn has secrets to tell you. Don’t go back to sleep.
author: Rumi

quote: Morning is the perfect time to reflect on your potential.
author: Unknown

quote: Make your mornings productive and your days successful.
author: Unknown

quote: Begin each day with a grateful heart and watch your world transform.
author: Unknown

quote: Morning is a reminder that life is meant for progress.
author: Unknown

quote: Early morning creativity can set the tone for your day.
author: Unknown

quote: The morning was full of sunlight and hope.
author: Kate Chopin

quote: Your future is created by what you do today, not tomorrow.
author: Robert Kiyosaki

quote: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every morning after a fall.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: Good morning! Remember: every morning brings new possibilities.
author: Unknown

quote: Wake up with courage and confidence.
author: Unknown

quote: The way you start your morning determines the rest of your day.
author: Unknown

quote: A morning filled with gratitude starts a day full of blessings.
author: Unknown

quote: Each morning is a chance to live purposefully.
author: Unknown

quote: Morning light sparks innovative ideas.
author: Unknown

quote: Rise early, work hard, strike oil.
author: J. Paul Getty

quote: Good morning! Start with a smile.
author: Unknown

quote: Every morning starts a new chapter in life’s book.
author: Unknown

quote: Wake up early and tackle the day before it tackles you.
author: Unknown

quote: Morning is the perfect time to empower yourself.
author: Unknown

quote: Plan your morning, plan your success.
author: Unknown

quote: Appreciate the new day, for it is a gift.
author: Unknown

quote: Begin your day with intention.
author: Unknown

quote: Morning inspiration fuels all-day creativity.
author: Unknown

quote: The morning steals the night’s shadows.
author: Emily Dickinson

quote: Morning brings hope, energy, and opportunity.
author: Unknown

quote: Each morning is a new battlefield—conquer it.
author: Unknown

quote: Early risers get a head start on life.
author: Unknown

quote: Morning confidence carries through the day.
author: Unknown

quote: Win the morning, win the day.
author: Tim Ferriss

quote: Morning reflection makes the day brighter.
author: Unknown

author: Unknown

author: Unknown

quote: Morning energy is the fuel for growth.

author: Unknown

quote: The sun rises even after the darkest night.
author: Unknown

quote: Morning habits determine evening results.

quote: Confidence starts with your first morning thought.
author: Unknown

quote: Mornings are for action, not excuses.
